#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
typedef unsigned long long ull;
ull GCD(ull a,ull b);
int main()
{
    int t,n,k;
    ull prod;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
              scanf("%d%d",&n,&k);
              int newk = (n-k > k ? k : n-k);
              int newn = n;
              prod = 1;
              for(int j=1;j<=newk;j++)
              {
                      ull y = GCD(prod,j);
                      prod /= y;
                      prod *= newn - j + 1;
                      prod /= (j/y);
              }
              cout << prod << endl;
    }
    //system("pause");
    return 0;
}
ull GCD(ull a,ull b)
{
    ull c;
    while(b>0)
    {
          c = a%b;
          a = b;
          b = c;    
    }
    return a;
}
